name: TÃ¤schbach
description:
Short but intense canyon. Only the upper part has been done for now.

Approach

From the car walk up Eggenstalden, from there you can enter the canyon easily right underneath of the water capture (make sure it is out of function already)

Descent

Not much after the start, you can already see the Bridge from where you can peak into the canyon. From there on it gets interesting. Best part is a 20m waterfall where you have to go through the water jet in the middle.

Exit

There is one more rappel after that Hammer, and then you should go out on the left side, and walk up through the steep forest.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Not sure how exactly the water captures are working there (further up in the valley there are some more), but in the canyon there is often grass on the sides, so there shouldn't be too much danger of getting caught in a flood wave.
